short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voice chat - talk with ChatGPT by ByteWise.One

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Engage in a conversation with ChatGPT and experience its responsive nature.

In this iteration, the speech detection is functioning adequately, but the text-to-speech function lacks stability. I am currently working on finding a solution to address this issue.

By utilizing your microphone, you can communicate with the extension, and it will transcribe your speech into text format.

This version leverages the Speech Recognition API of the Browser, resulting in remarkable speed and reasonably accurate outcomes.

For the upcoming release, I am excited to incorporate the Whisper API from OpenAI, as it promises significantly improved voice recognition capabilities.

Moreover, in the version that follows, I will integrate a superior text-to-speech feature with a more pleasant and soothing voice. My aim is to create an experience that leaves users feeling relaxed and content while interacting with the system, moving away from the mundane default voice.
